articles.description: It was a finale that defied logic and order, but, for the first time in a long time, England found a way through the final-quarter maelstrom to victory.
articles.title: Six Nations: England pluck victory from chaos against France

articles.description: Can the Kansas City Chiefs complete an unprecedented three-peat in Super Bowl 59 or will the Philadelphia Eagles gain revenge?
articles.title: Super Bowl 2025: UK time, half-time show, Taylor Swift & Donald Trump

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Madrid vs Atlético Madrid in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Real Madrid vs Atlético Madrid: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head

articles.description: The debate over the use of technology in football is nothing new - but in the FA Cup fourth round its absence has provided a frequent talking point.
articles.title: FA Cup: Lack of video assistant referee technology felt in fourth round

articles.description: Anthony Davis' impressive debut for the Dallas Mavericks is cut short by injury during their win against the Houston Rockets.
articles.title: NBA: Anthony Davis goes off injured during Dallas Mavericks debut against Houston Rockets

articles.description: Brighton come from behind to beat fellow Premier League  side Chelsea and reach the fifth round of the FA Cup.
articles.title: Brighton & Hove Albion 2-1 Chelsea: Georginio Rutter and Kaoru Mitoma goals put hosts through in FA Cup

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz will face Alex de Minaur in the Rotterdam Open final on Sunday after defeating Hubert Hurkacz in the semi-finals.
articles.title: Rotterdam Open: Carlos Alcaraz to face Alex de Minaur in Sunday's final

articles.description: Switzerland's Belinda Bencic beats USA's Ashlyn Krueger in the Abu Dhabi Open final for her first WTA title since becoming a mother.
articles.title: Abu Dhabi Open: Belinda Bencic beats Ashlyn Krueger to win ninth title

articles.description: Irish super-featherweight boxer John Cooney dies after suffering a brain injury in last Saturday's defeat by Welshman Nathan Howells in Belfast.
articles.title: John Cooney: Irish boxer dies after suffering brain injury in Belfast fight

articles.description: Joe Willock's double - including a controversial first goal - helps keep alive Newcastle's dreams of a second Wembley appearance this season as they edged past battling Birmingham.
articles.title: Birmingham 2-3 Newcastle: Joe Willock's double sends Premier League side through
